text: André Haakmat (21 March 1939 – 25 November 2024) was a Surinamese politician and lawyer. He served in Suriname as the deputy prime minister, minister of Foreign Affairs, minister of Justice and Police and minister of Justice and Police from 1980 to 1981. Haakmat died in Amsterdam on 25 November 2024, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:Surinamese politicians Category:South American lawyers Category:1939 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from Paramaribo
title: André Haakmat
